tech_news.title: Ubisoft Cancels Six Games, Slashes Guidance in Restructuring - Bloomberg
tech_news.description: Ubisoft Entertainment SA shares crashed the most in its history after the Assassin’s Creed maker said it would cancel game projects, shut down studios and cut its guidance.
